de.iabg.math
Class AbstractMatrix

java.lang.Object
  de.iabg.math.AbstractMatrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
Matrix
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiagonalMatrix, RectangularMatrix, SymmetricMatrix
public abstract class AbstractMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements Matrix

This default implementation of a Matrix provides basic methods and storage for row and column names. Storage of the cells is left to subclasses to determine optimal behavior.

Version:
September 10, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
